io.spine.server.integration

Class ExternalMessageEnvelope

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.type.AbstractMessageEnvelope<com.google.protobuf.Message,io.spine.server.integration.ExternalMessage,io.spine.core.ActorContext>
      • io.spine.server.integration.ExternalMessageEnvelope
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessageEnvelope<com.google.protobuf.Message,io.spine.server.integration.ExternalMessage,io.spine.core.ActorContext>

    public final class ExternalMessageEnvelope
extends AbstractMessageEnvelope<com.google.protobuf.Message,io.spine.server.integration.ExternalMessage,io.spine.core.ActorContext>
    An envelope for the messages produced outside of the current Bounded Context.

    • Method Detail

      • of

        public static ExternalMessageEnvelope of(io.spine.server.integration.ExternalMessage externalMessage,
                                         com.google.protobuf.Message originalMessage)
        Creates a new instance of ExternalMessageEnvelope from the ExternalMessage instance and the message transferred inside the ExternalMessage such as a io.spine.sample.TaskCreated event message.

        This factory method provides an optimal performance of the ExternalMessageEnvelope creation. It allows to avoid unpacking the original message from the ExternalMessage instance.

        Parameters:
        externalMessage - the instance of ExternalMessage to wrap into an envelope
        originalMessage - the message instance, which was originally transferred inside the externalMessage such as a io.spine.sample.TaskCreated event message.
        Returns:
        the new instance of external message envelope.

      • id

        public com.google.protobuf.Message id()
        Description copied from interface: MessageEnvelope
        The ID of the message.

      • message

        public com.google.protobuf.Message message()
        Obtains an originally transferred message. For instance, io.spine.sample.TaskCreated event message may returned for an external event transferred inside of this envelope instance.
        Returns:
        the instance of origin message

      • messageClass

        public io.spine.type.MessageClass messageClass()
        Obtains a message class of an originally transferred message such as io.spine.sample.TaskCreated class.
        Returns:
        the event message
        See Also:
        ExternalMessageEnvelope.message(), ExternalMessageEnvelope.of(ExternalMessage, Message)

      • context

        public io.spine.core.ActorContext context()
        Description copied from interface: MessageEnvelope
        Obtains the context of the message.

      • toEventEnvelope

        public EventEnvelope toEventEnvelope()
        Converts this instance to an envelope of the external event.

      • asMessageOrigin

        public io.spine.core.Origin asMessageOrigin()
        This method is not supported and always throws UnsupportedOperationException.

        This should never happen as no event is caused directly by an ExternalMessage.

        Instead, the external messages are consumed by an anti-corruption layer such as external reactor or subscriber methods in the destination Bounded Context.

        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - always
